headerDisplay: For instructions on how to prepare your BroadLink RM and Dyson BP01 to be used by this plugin, please look [here](https://github.com/jeremynoesen/homebridge-dyson-bp01#device-setup).

name.title: Name
name.description: The display name of the accessory in Homebridge and HomeKit. This must be unique per accessory.

mac.title: MAC Address
mac.description: If you have multiple BroadLink RMs, enter the MAC address of the one controlling the fan. Leave blank for device auto-discovery.
